title: Morgana's Lovers
description: While her husband is away, Princess Morgana's desires grow as the once inexperienced princess explores her intense longings for a guard and two female servants. When the prince arrives back at the castle, he catches the princess in an innocent, yet provocative, act. His fantasies burning, he brings a servant woman to join them in their royal bedchamber. Morgana's Lovers is the second book of the series Morgana's Passion. The first book is "Morgana's Desire." The third book in the series is "Taking Morgana"This erotic tale includes explicit sex scenes, and light BDSM, dominance/submission between consenting adults.
author: Destiny H. Macintosh
